en.title: {{Oxygen}} Design System
en.text: Led the development and enhancement of Oxygen Design System serving 40M+ monthly users with 50+ reusable components in React and React Native. Achieved 80% snapshot test coverage and optimized components for better performance.

en.title: {{Performance}} Optimization Initiative
en.text: Optimized 8-10 React components reducing JS main-thread blocking by 120ms on CarWale model page. Lifted Lighthouse score from 84 to 92 with improved accessibility scores. Implemented counter-based hashing for atomic class names reducing DOM size by 8%.

en.title: {{Animation}} Documentation Hub
en.text: Established centralized animation documentation with 60+ illustrative examples using GSAP and CSS animations. Reduced revision time by 25% and now used by 10+ designers for creating engaging ad experiences.

en.title: {{Template}} Automation System
en.text: Automated template generation via configurable panel, eliminating manual developer intervention and reducing template build time by 70%. Streamlined workflow for creating responsive ad templates.

en.title: {{BikeWale}} React Migration
en.text: Led migration of BikeWale non-React pages to React, enhancing performance by 20% and improving maintainability. Implemented modern React patterns and optimized bundle sizes.

en.title: {{Configuration}} Management App
en.text: Enhanced filter search UX by eliminating input lag (40% faster) using React useTransition. Optimized version graph component reducing render time by 35% and bundle size by 18%. Improved UI responsiveness by 30% under heavy data loads.

en.title: {{Vans}} Life
en.text: A React-based van rental application featuring dynamic routing, state management, and responsive design for browsing and booking camper vans.

en.title: {{Tenzies}} Dice Game
en.text: Interactive dice game built with React featuring game logic, state management, and engaging UI animations for an entertaining user experience.

en.title: {{Quizzical}} App
en.text: Quiz application built with React that fetches questions from an API, tracks scores, and provides instant feedback with a clean, intuitive interface.

en.title: {{248}} Game
en.text: Number puzzle game built with vanilla JavaScript featuring smooth animations and game logic.

en.title: {{Pumpkin}} Meme
en.text: Fun meme generator with interactive features and creative design elements.

en.title: {{Restaurant}} Food Ordering
en.text: Food ordering application with cart functionality and order management system.

en.title: {{Cookie}} Consent
en.text: Interactive cookie consent modal with humorous approach to user permissions.

en.title: {{Convert}} a Unit
en.text: Unit conversion tool supporting multiple measurement types with clean interface.

en.title: {{Add to Cart}} App
en.text: Shopping cart application with add/remove functionality and local storage.

en.title: {{Meme}} Generator
en.text: Meme creation tool with text overlay and image selection features.

en.title: {{Twitter}} Clone Twimba
en.text: Twitter-like social media interface with posting and interaction features.

en.title: {{Basketball}} Score
en.text: Basketball scoreboard application with real-time score tracking.

en.title: {{Generate}} a Password
en.text: Secure password generator with customizable options and strength indicators.

en.title: {{Intro}} Page
en.text: Clean and modern introduction page with responsive design and smooth animations.

en.title: {{Shoes NFT}} Responsive
en.text: Fully responsive NFT showcase page for shoes with modern design principles.

en.title: {{Responsive}} Using Flex
en.text: Demonstration of responsive design techniques using CSS Flexbox layout.
